extendedInfo.description: Find the secret garden of your soul, make it fullfill with flowers and trees, activate springs. When the melody of peace is playing, your will get blessed! The "Jardin Secret" is based on an ancient game called "The labyrinth of 3 balls". The final goal is put all 3 balls into the inner ring. So what you need to do is just tilt your device and make the balls moving. Remember there are 3 balls need to be taken care of. So let us start now !
